attributes.action: display vehicle speeds in the immediate vicinity of listed buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From tithe cottate to coaching inn, many of the country's listed buildings were built by the roadside. The best examples are rightly listed to preserve them for future generations - and are now vibrated daily by HGVs. 
These buildings weren't constructed to withstand the pounding they now receive. That pounding is magnified with speed. 
We call upon the Government to promote the use of active speed displays in the immediate vicinity of listed buildings.
